title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - January 24th, 2020
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - January 24th, 2020
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.


Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek:


The Credit Card Debt Trap

Tesla’s Battle with Short Sellers

The Goop Lifestyle Brand

Klaus Zellmer, CEO of Porsche North America

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
